meanings.definition: A notch or indentation in a wall for a battlement.
meanings.sent1: The castle wall had a crenel where the archer could hide.
meanings.sent2: The ancient fortress had many crenels for defense.
meanings.sent3: The crenel in the wall looked like a small window for the soldiers.
meanings.sent4: The crenel in the stone wall was like a secret passage for the defenders.
meanings.sent5: The crenel in the castle wall was a key part of its defense strategy.

meanings.sent1: The mason will crenel the castle walls for added protection.
meanings.sent2: The architect decided to crenel the tower to make it more secure.
meanings.sent3: The workers will crenel the fortress walls to make them stronger.
meanings.sent4: The builders will crenel the structure to enhance its defensive capabilities.
meanings.sent5: The team plans to crenel the walls to fortify the entire castle.
